duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and approve employee expense reports, ensuring compliance with company policy and rationality.
Conduct audits and quality control for historical expense reports.
Handle urgent reimbursement and credit card report cases.
Identify and report problems with reimbursement and credit card reports.
Participate in industry research and optimization of the Reimbursement Standard Operating Procedures (SOP).
Deliver reimbursement education to internal and external customers.
Provide support to the Reimbursement Call Center.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or higher, preferably in accounting or finance-related field.
